title: Turns out NASCAR in Chicago wasn’t all that good for walking and biking safety – Urbanist Update
content:
82 percent of voters in a recent survey are against in highway expansion, a reflection on private events in pubic space, the 5 Boros Bike Ride, and more.

Read the full article at Turns out NASCAR in Chicago wasn’t all that good for walking and biking safety – Urbanist Update on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
